titles.title: I've Found The Answer, I've Learned To Pray

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found the answer, I've learned to pray.
With faith to guide me, I've found the way.
The sun is shining for me each day.
I've found the answer, I've learned to pray.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I was weak and weary, I had gone astray.
Walking in the darkness, I could not find my way.
Jesus came and found me, brought new life within,
Led me out of darkness, and took away my sins.
